snippet: MESSRS. EDITORS: The Journal of Commerce, in the spirit of a Jeffries, asks why the persons engaged in the rescue of the man "Jerry," at Syracuse, should not be indicted for "treason," especially as those who shot Gorsuch, at Christiana, have been...

byline.original: Correspondence of The New-York Daily Times

lead_paragraph: MESSRS. EDITORS: The Journal of Commerce, in the spirit of a Jeffries, asks why the persons engaged in the rescue of the man "Jerry," at Syracuse, should not be indicted for "treason," especially as those who shot Gorsuch, at Christiana, have been indicted for that offense.
